improvement_list.improvement_desc: The inner loop (lines 29-46) has zero execution frequency. The condition `current_sum >= target` is never met because `current_sum` starts at 0 and `target` is always positive.  This is likely a logic error in the algorithm. The algorithm should check if `current_sum` becomes greater than or equal to `target`.

The `if` statement on line 48 has zero execution frequency. The condition `min_length == n + 1` will always be false because `min_length` is initialized to `n + 1` and is only decreased if the while loop executes (which, as stated above, never happens). This code is unreachable and should be reviewed.
The `print` statement on line 55 has zero execution frequency, because the code inside the loop never gets executed.
